faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about introducing AI with CretoWorks.

items.question: What are the costs for AI implementation?
items.answer: It depends on the complexity and model requirements. CretoWorks offers optimized plans tailored to your budget, from low-cost AI solutions to enterprise-grade custom development.

items.question: How long does it take to build a service?
items.answer: Off-the-shelf solutions can be introduced immediately, while custom AI projects typically take 4 to 12 weeks. We provide a detailed roadmap during the initial consultation.

items.question: Can I use it without technical knowledge?
items.answer: Absolutely. CretoWorks handles all technical processes from planning to development and actual operation. We provide close tech consulting so you can focus only on business ideas and utilization.

items.question: How is post-management and maintenance handled?
items.answer: A dedicated team performs real-time monitoring to ensure system stability. We also promise regular model advancement and security updates in line with rapidly evolving AI technology trends.
